I am a maker and I like building products and solving problems through code. I enjoy thinking about all the weird ways in which i can tweak things around me and challenge myself in creative ways !

My Interests include Psychology, Music and Product Design. In my spare time you will often find me curled up over my guitar just jamming alone.

To connect with me, feel free to say a Hi at my e-mail ID : siddhantjain455 at the rate gmail.com
